title: Green Goddess Salad
promptIMG: Green Goddess Salad, on plate, natural food photography, balanced sharp focus, zero blur throughout entire image, infinite depth of field, realistic food textures, modern kitchen background in sharp focus, natural lighting, kitchen countertop visible, even focus distribution, documentary food photography, natural sharpness --no blur, depth of field, bokeh, over-sharpening, artificial enhancement --quality 2 --raw --stylize 300
description: This vibrant Green Goddess Salad is a refreshing and nutritious dish that bursts with flavor and color. Packed with fresh greens and a creamy herb dressing, it's perfect for a light lunch or as a side at dinner.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and red onion.
Drizzle with Green Goddess dressing and toss gently to combine.
tips: For the best flavor, let the salad sit for a few minutes after dressing to allow the greens to absorb the flavors.

structured_content.content: This Green Goddess Salad is not just a feast for the eyes; it's a celebration of fresh ingredients that come together to create a deliciously creamy and herbaceous dressing. Perfect for warm days, this salad is sure to impress your family and friends.

note.label: Why You'll Love This Recipe
note.content:
• Quick and easy to make in under 15 minutes
  • Restaurant-quality flavors at home
  • Perfect for weeknight dinners or entertaining
  • Uses simple ingredients you likely have on hand
  • Can be customized with your favorite veggies

structured_content.content: I remember the first time I made this salad for a summer picnic. The vibrant colors and fresh flavors were a hit, and it quickly became a staple at our gatherings.

• Main ingredient: Mixed greens provide a fresh base; choose a variety for texture.
  • Key seasonings/flavoring agents: The Green Goddess dressing is essential for that creamy, herbaceous flavor.
  • Supporting ingredients: Cherry tomatoes and cucumbers add crunch and sweetness, while avocado gives creaminess.
  • Equipment needed: A large bowl for mixing and a knife for chopping.

upload.context: A vibrant display of fresh ingredients for the Green Goddess Salad, showcasing the colors and textures.

structured_content.content:
Preparation:
Wash and dry the mixed greens thoroughly. Slice the cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Cooking/Baking Process:
No cooking required; simply combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Finishing Touches:
Garnish with extra herbs or seeds for added texture and flavor.

upload.context: The process of tossing the salad with the dressing, highlighting the fresh ingredients.

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Use fresh herbs in your dressing for maximum flavor.
  • Avoid over-dressing the salad to keep it light and fresh.
  • Look for vibrant, crisp greens to ensure the best texture.
  • This salad can be stored in the fridge for a day, but it's best enjoyed fresh.

structured_content.content: This salad is a family favorite, often enjoyed during our summer barbecues. It's a dish that brings everyone together, sharing laughter and delicious food.
Add nuts or seeds for crunch, or toss in some grilled chicken or shrimp for added protein. Fresh herbs like basil or dill can also elevate the flavor profile.
Pair this salad with grilled meats, a chilled white wine, or serve it as a side to your favorite summer dishes.
For a vegan version, use a plant-based dressing and add chickpeas for protein. You can also swap out the greens for kale or spinach for a different texture.

upload.context: The final plated Green Goddess Salad, beautifully arranged and ready to serve.

note.label: Pro Tips
note.content:
• Chill your bowl before mixing for extra crispness.
  • Let the salad sit for a few minutes after dressing to enhance the flavors.
  • Use a variety of greens for a more complex flavor.
  • Presentation matters; arrange ingredients artfully for an impressive look.

structured_content.content: Don't hesitate to try this Green Goddess Salad; it's a simple yet delightful dish that will bring joy to your table. Enjoy the process of making it and the satisfaction of sharing it with loved ones!
